text: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
translation: 39.Nabii Yuusuf casbit kaâ luk yan namma furraynuk yi namma kataysaw fixiixih tan maggo Yallittey fixiixih ginnimteh qibaada aysuk raqta innaa?hinnay inki Yallay dirkiseh yanih qibaada aysuk raqtaah keenik iyye.
